definitions.definition: To reverence ( a deity , etc. ) with supreme respect and veneration ; to perform religious exercises in honour of.
To honour with extravagant love and extreme submission , as a lover; to adore ; to idolize .

examples: We worship at the church down the road.

definitions.definition: To touch , fondle , or kiss in an intensely sensual way.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To reverence ( a deity , etc. ) with supreme respect and veneration ; to perform religious exercises in honour of.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To honour with extravagant love and extreme submission , as a lover; to adore ; to idolize .
( intransitive ) To participate in religious ceremonies.
To touch , fondle , or kiss in an intensely sensual way.
